title: Bug 42225 - Issue with Ctrl+Backspace Key Assignment
description: This bug report addresses an issue where Ctrl+Backspace is misinterpreted as Ctrl+Del, resulting in the deletion of the next word. The reporter has a Swiss German Keyboard using Swiss German Locale.
OB: The observed behavior is that the keybinding manager interprets Ctrl+Backspace as Ctrl+Del, deleting the next word when pressed.
EB: The expected behavior is that out of the box, Ctrl+Backspace should delete the previous word without being misinterpreted as Ctrl+Del.
SR: The steps to reproduce the issue are missing from the report. To better understand and address this problem, detailed steps to reproduce the behavior are needed.
